definition: identifying word or words by which someone or something is called and classified or distinguished from others
details:
noun
- identifying word or words by which someone or something is called and classified or distinguished from others
= synonyms: designation
- a class of one kind of unit in a system of numbers or measures or weights or money
= example: a class of one kind of unit in a system of numbers or measures or weights or money
- a group of religious congregations having its own organization and a distinctive faith
